sn45.179:1.3: Substantialist view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances, sensual desire, and ill will.
sn45.179:1.4: These are the five lower fetters.
sn45.179:1.5: The noble eightfold path should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these five lowers fetters.”
